definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
(slang) to stick sth up the anus/to have anal intercourse

sentences.english: Chrysanthemum princess is forced to taking imperial jade seal, abscond everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 菊花公主被迫带着玉玺，四处逃亡。

sentences.english: Hydrangea is a spherical gold chrysanthemums hunters.
sentences.chinese: 金绣球是球状菊花的大姐大。

sentences.english: People often gather for a party, appreciate chrysanthemums, pin the leaves of Cornus on clothes.
sentences.chinese: 人们经常聚在一起聚会，欣赏菊花，销的叶子在衣服。

sentences.english: The result of a Jurassic Chrysanthemum, will be our destiny do.
sentences.chinese: 一侏菊花的结果，会成为我们之间的宿命吗。

sentences.english: Jiao-Yan is one of chrysanthemums in full bloom, in the stria left.
sentences.chinese: 是一朵娇艳盛放的菊花，纹在左腰。

sentences.english: Have a cup of herbal tea, such as chamomile, to relax your body.
sentences.chinese: 喝一杯草本茶以放松身体，比如白菊花茶。

sentences.english: Chrysanthemum indicum L. was used as the raw material to extract antioxidant materials by microwave technology.
sentences.chinese: 以野菊花花蕾为材料，研究其提取物的抗氧化活性。

sentences.english: The chrysanthemum flower wine is unique in brewing.
sentences.chinese: 菊花酒的酿造十分独特。

sentences.english: Chrysanthemum stone is a natural in the geological "Flora".
sentences.chinese: 菊花石是地质中的一种天然“花卉”。

sentences.english: The chrysanthemums are in bloom; some are red andsome yellow.
sentences.chinese: 菊花开了，有红的有黄的。

sentences.english: Autumn Qing Yang, chrysanthemum fragrance, but also a fall festival.
sentences.chinese: 秋风轻扬，菊花飘香，又是一个秋季节。

sentences.english: Extraction and identification of Flavonoid glycoside from Chrysanthemum morofolium Ramat.
sentences.chinese: 杭菊花中黄酮苷的研究。

sentences.english: Every day T'ao went to the north yard where Ma lived, and helped him care for the chrysanthemums.
sentences.chinese: 陶三郎每天去马子才住的北院，帮他培养菊花。

sentences.english: I'll come for your chrysanthemums again.
sentences.chinese: 待到重阳日，还来就菊花。

sentences.english: Fan Hai Lei picked up noggin to beverage chrysanthemum tea.
sentences.chinese: 范海勒拿起小茶杯喝了口菊花茶。

sentences.english: Almond blossom and floral notes of camomile on a vegetal background.
sentences.chinese: 在植物香气的背景之上有杏花和甘菊花香。

definition: Mudan District of Heze City 菏澤市|菏泽市[He2 ze2 Shi4], Shandong/Mutan township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
